title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-2.5 - Examination for certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-2.5 - Examination for certification

State Regulations

An applicant for certification of his competence as a
boiler inspector whose application has been accepted may take an examination
for such certification at such reasonable time and place and upon such
reasonable notice as the commissioner may determine. The examination shall be
written and shall be limited to testing the extent of the applicant's knowledge
of the construction, installation, operation, maintenance and inspection of
boilers as defined by subdivision 6 of section
204
of the Labor

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
